description.value:
School transmutation; Level druid 3, hunter 3, ranger 3;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S, M (a pinch of dirt)

Range personal
Targets you
Duration 1 hour/level (D)

Description

This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.hosf489xyoexmp57]{Longstrider}, except it gives you a +20-foot enhancement bonus to your base speed and a +10-foot enhancement bonus to your other modes of movement (burrow, climb, fly, swim, and so on). It does not affect movement modes you do not actually have-for example, if you do not have a swim speed, this spell does not grant you a swim speed.
